page.title: 19LOCAL LEGENDS AND EVENTS.
page.content: Within the study area there are 2 ghost stories that we are aware of. The firstconcerns the Cosford Bridge Pumping Works where a man is said to have died during its construction by falling into a borehole.He nows haunts the pumping room at night.The other concerns a child who fell into one of the pools at Hatton Grange and whose mother was drowned attempting to save her.She now drifts around the pool as a"vague white shape." Other interesting events concern a fire at Bowling Green House at which a horse drawn fire engine from Shifnal pulled up incorrectly at a nearby farm and scared the pregnant farmers wife so much that the baby was born there and then and a Bonfire Night party held in the meadow below Cosford Pool. Within hours of the 150 having left the dam burst and flooded the meadow.
